actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire private lands in California for water quality control, recreation, and fish and wildlife enhancement, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire private lands in California for water quality control, recreation, and fish and wildlife enhancement. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire private lands in California for water quality control, recreation, and fish and wildlife enhancement, and for other purposes.
